bibl.title: Style and Imitation in the New Gallus.
bibl.note: A longer version of this paper was first presented at the Annual Meeting of the American Philological Association, Boston, December 28, 1979, as part of a panel devoted to the new Gallus.
bibl.seg: van Sickle John A., Style and Imitation in the New Gallus.
A longer version of this paper was first presented at the Annual Meeting of the American Philological Association, Boston, December 28, 1979, as part of a panel devoted to the new Gallus.
